NAME: Namen
DESC: This Data Type generates human names in any format you need.
example_fullnames: Alex Smith oder Alex J. Smith
help_intro: Sie können mehrere Formate angeben, indem Sie auf die Eingabetaste klicken. Die folgenden Zeichenfolgen werden in ihre zufälligen Namensäquivalente konvertiert:
name: Name
namesSourceDesc: By default this Data Type generates mostly Western names. To target names that are common for a particular country or countries, in the main data grid, click the little "World" icon to the right of the options field. That will open a dialog where you can customize the source.
defaultWesternNames: By default this Data Type generates mostly Western names
customizeSourceDesc: This Data Type generates mostly Western names but if you want to generate names more appropriate to a particular region, select the countries you would like below.
